description: Sporty quarter zip style meets the feeling of perfectly broken-in fabric with the Cardiff 1/4 zip for men. And whether this is your first Cardiff style or you’re a long-time fan, you’re going to want this in your collection. Start with a 100% sustainable blend of hemp, recycled polyester, and TENCEL™ Lyocell. The result is a vintage-like texture that radiates that classic style we all know and want. Bonus: it even has UPF 50+. And has ribbed-knit fabric at the sleeve cuffs and bottom band and a front welt chest pocket. With a classic standard fit, this style pair is practically anything.
name: Prana Cardiff 1/4 Zip - Mens
